name: Garuda
description: Death’s crimson maiden sharpens her talons. Garuda weaponizes the blood of her foes to deal high damage. Sanguine beauty complements her deadly power.

abilities.name: Dread Mirror
abilities.description: Rip the life force from an enemy and use it as a shield that captures damage, this kills significantly weakened enemies instantly. Charge to channel the captured damage into an explosive projectile.

abilities.name: Blood Altar
abilities.description: Impale an enemy on an altar of talons and siphon health for Garuda and her allies.

abilities.name: Bloodletting
abilities.description: Garuda sacrifices her health to generate energy and clear Status Effects.

abilities.name: Seeking Talons
abilities.description: Charge to expand the targeting area, release to send Garuda's talons careening toward each target in area. Surviving enemies are prone to <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Status.

languages.description: Die purpurrote Maid Todes schärft ihre Klauen. Garuda verwandelt das Blut ihrer Feinde in eine Waffe und teilt hohen Schaden aus. Blutige Schönheit ergänzt ihre tödliche Kraft.
languages.name: Garuda

languages.description: La jeune envoyée de la mort aiguise ses serres. Garuda fait couler le sang de ses ennemis et inflige des Dégâts importants. La beauté sanguinaire de la puissance mortelle.
languages.name: Garuda

languages.description: La fanciulla cremisi della morte affila gli artigli. Garuda utilizza come arma il sangue dei nemici per infliggere danni elevati. La sua bellezza sanguinaria affianca il suo potere mortale.
languages.name: Garuda

languages.description: 죽음의 진홍색 여인이 자신의 발톱을 더욱 날카롭게 갈고 닦습니다. 가루다는 자신의 적에게서 뽑아낸 피를 무기 삼아 높은 피해를 가합니다. 선혈의 심홍에서 오는 아름다움은 그녀의 치명적인 힘을 더욱 완벽하게 빛냅니다.
languages.name: 가루다

languages.description: La doncella carmesí de la muerte afila sus garras. Garuda usa la sangre de sus enemigos como arma para causar un gran daño. La belleza sanguínea complementa su poder letal.
languages.name: Garuda

languages.description: 血之女王磨砺着她的利爪。Garuda 以敌人的血液为武器，造成高额伤害。血色的美丽与她致命的力量相得益彰。
languages.name: Garuda

languages.description: Алая дева смерти точит когти. Гаруда использует кровь врагов для нанесения большого урона. Кровавая красота дополняет её смертоносную силу.
languages.name: Гаруда

languages.description: 真紅の死乙女は爪を研ぐ。Garudaは敵の血を武器にして大ダメージを与える。血に彩られた美しさが彼女の致命的な力を引き立てる。
languages.name: Garuda

languages.description: Szkarłatna dziewica śmierci ostrzy swoje szpony. Garuda wykorzystuje krew swoich wrogów, by zadawać wysokie obrażenia. Krwawe piękno uzupełnia jej zabójczą siłę.
languages.name: Garuda

languages.description: A dama escarlate da morte afia suas garras. A Garuda transforma o sangue de seus inimigos em uma arma para causar alto dano. Sua beleza sanguinária complementa seu poder mortal.
languages.name: Garuda

languages.description: 死亡的緋紅少女磨快她的利爪。 Garuda 將敵人的鮮血武器化以造成高傷害。血色之美襯託她的致命威力。
languages.name: Garuda

languages.description: Garuda คือหญิงสาวที่มาพร้อมกับความตายสีเลือดที่คอยลับกรงเล็บให้คมอยู่เสมอ ใช้เลือดของศัตรูเป็นอาวุธเพื่อสร้างความเสียหายสูง ความงามจากโลหิตที่แดงก่ำช่วยเติมเต็มพลังแห่งความตาย
languages.name: Garuda

languages.description: Ölümün kızıl prensesi pençelerini keskinleştiriyor. Garuda yüksek hasar vermek için düşmanlarının kanını silah olarak kullanır. İyimser güzelliği onun ölümcül gücünü tamamlar.
languages.name: Garuda

languages.description: Діва смерті з гострими пазурами. Ґаруда перетворює кров ворогів на зброю, щоб завдавати великої шкоди. Закривавлений вигляд доповнює її смертоносну силу.
languages.name: Ґаруда
